alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Madison (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 19 at 5:59PM CDT until August 19 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Jackson County in northeastern Alabama... Northeastern Madison County in north central Alabama... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 559 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gurley, or 7 miles east of Huntsville, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Huntsville, Moores Mill, Gurley, Alabama A And M University, New Market, Maysville, Princeton, Plevna, Hampton Cove and Brownsboro. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
